content: 50 place the eyes symmetrically a bit higher than the nose and sew them with black yarn making a few stitches to embroider the pupils image 51 try the hat on sew it with the end of yarn that we left before fasten and cut the yarn hiding the end inside the head image 52 take a piece of grey yarn and place it diagonally from one shoulder to the arm opposite fasten and cut the yarn on the back hiding the end inside the body image 53 18 assembly congratulations your butters and gnome are ready image 55 image 56 image 54 if you enjoyed this pattern subscribe for more image 57 @aradiya_ | #aradiyatoys /aradiyatoys /aradiyatoys @aradiyatoys
